cookie.title: Protecting Your Privacy
cookie.subtitle: We use essential cookies
cookie.explanation: MirrorBuddy uses cookies to protect you and improve your learning experience. Essential cookies are necessary for the app to work securely.

list.session: Session cookies to keep your login secure
list.preferences: Cookies to remember your accessibility and language preferences
list.protect: Security cookies to protect you from attacks and abuse

customize.title: Cookie Preferences
customize.description: Choose which cookies you want to accept. Essential cookies are always required for the app to work.
customize.essentialDesc: Required for security and functionality. Cannot be disabled.

cookie.coppa: If you are under 13, your parents received a notice to approve essential cookies.

privacy.title: Privacy Agreement
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us
privacy.processingText: MirrorBuddy processes only the data necessary to provide you with a personalized and secure learning experience.
privacy.storageText: Your data is stored on secure servers in Europe with guaranteed GDPR compliance.
privacy.retentionText: We retain your data for as long as necessary for the service. You can request deletion at any time.

terms.required: You must accept the Terms of Service to continue.

parentalConsent.responsibilitiesText: As a parent, you agree to supervise platform use and are responsible for the minor's activity.

aiDisclosure.title: AI Disclosure
aiDisclosure.statement: This platform uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to personalize your learning.
aiDisclosure.howWeUseAIText: AI is used to provide personalized tutoring, adaptive feedback, and learning recommendations. Critical decisions remain under human control.
aiDisclosure.aiLimitationsText: AI is not perfect. It can make mistakes and should not replace human judgment. We encourage critical questions and feedback.
aiDisclosure.humanOversightText: All critical AI functions are supervised by qualified teachers and educational specialists.

withdrawal.title: Consent Withdrawal
withdrawal.howToWithdraw: You can withdraw consent at any time by accessing your privacy settings.
withdrawal.withdrawalSteps:
1. Sign in to your account
2. Go to Settings > Privacy and Consent
3. Select which consents you want to withdraw
4. Confirm the withdrawal request
5. Your data will be deleted per GDPR regulations
withdrawal.emailWithdrawal: Alternatively, you can send us a formal withdrawal request email.
withdrawal.consequencesText: Withdrawing certain consents may prevent access to specific platform features.
